params.amount: Amount of LEAGUE tokens to deposit

returns._0: sufficient Whether pool can cover the amount

collectLosingBet(uint256).details: Called by BettingPool when user loses

params.amount: Amount of LEAGUE from losing bet

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Should only be used in catastrophic scenarios

fundSeeding(uint256,uint256).details: Called by BettingPool before round starts

getAllLPs().details: This is gas-intensive, should only be called off-chain

returns.lpAddresses: Array of LP addresses (empty in this version - would need tracking)

returns._0: available Amount of LEAGUE available for withdrawals/payouts

returns.roiBPS: Return on investment in basis points (10000 = 100%)

returns.atRiskAmount: Amount currently locked in pending bets
returns.roiBPS: Return on investment in basis points

returns.shareAmount: Amount of LEAGUE the LP can withdraw
returns.sharePercentage: Percentage of pool owned (in basis points)

returns.maxWithdrawable: Maximum amount that can be withdrawn now

returns.utilizationBPS: Percentage of liquidity locked (in basis points)

lockLiquidity(uint256).details: Called by BettingPool to reserve liquidity for known payouts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

partialWithdrawal(uint256).details: Allows partial withdrawals when liquidity is locked

returns.sharesBurned: Actual shares burned (may be less than requested)

payWinner(address,uint256).details: Called by BettingPool when user wins

returns.shares: Number of shares that would be minted

returns.amount: Amount of LEAGUE that would be received (after fee)

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: Cannot recover LEAGUE tokens (would break accounting)

params.shares: Number of LP shares to burn

returns.amount: Amount of LEAGUE tokens received (after withdrawal fee)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returnSeedFunds(uint256).details: Called by BettingPool after round is finalizedTokens are transferred first, then this updates accounting

params.amount: Amount to return (seed + LP's share of profit)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlockLiquidity(uint256).details: Called by BettingPool after payouts are processed

addLiquidity(uint256).notice: Add liquidity to the pool and receive LP shares

canCoverPayout(uint256).notice: Check if pool has enough liquidity for a payout

collectLosingBet(uint256).notice: Collect losing bet into pool (increases LP value)

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdraw (owner only, use with extreme caution)

fundSeeding(uint256,uint256).notice: Fund round seeding from LP pool

getAllLPs().notice: Get all LP addresses and their positions (for frontend dashboard)

getLPPositionDetailed(address).notice: Get comprehensive LP position with risk metrics

getLPValue(address).notice: Get LP's share of the pool

getMaxWithdrawableAmount(address).notice: Get maximum withdrawable amount for an LP

isActiveLP(address).notice: Check if address is an active LP

partialWithdrawal(uint256).notice: Partial withdrawal - withdraw as much as possible up to requested shares

payWinner(address,uint256).notice: Pay out winning bet from pool (decreases LP value)

previewDeposit(uint256).notice: Calculate shares that would be minted for a given deposit

previewWithdrawal(uint256).notice: Calculate LEAGUE amount for burning shares

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens sent by mistake

removeLiquidity(uint256).notice: Remove liquidity from the pool by burning LP shares

returnSeedFunds(uint256).notice: Return seed funds and profit to LP pool after round ends

setAuthorizedCaller(address,bool).notice: Authorize a contract to interact with the pool
